A

AbstractNode - Class in sgraph
This abstract class implements the INode interface.
AbstractNode(IScenegraph, String) - Constructor for class sgraph.AbstractNode
 
add(PolygonMesh, Matrix4f) - Method in class util.PolygonMesh
Add the transformed mesh "obj" using transform to this mesh and return this mesh.
addChild(INode) - Method in class sgraph.AbstractNode
By default, throws an exception.
addChild(INode) - Method in class sgraph.GroupNode
Since a group node is capable of having children, this method overrides the default one in AbstractNode and adds a child to this node
addChild(INode) - Method in interface sgraph.INode
Add a child to this node.
addChild(INode) - Method in class sgraph.TransformNode
Since this node can have a child, it override this method and adds the child to itself This will overwrite any children set for this node previously.
addMesh(String, PolygonMesh) - Method in class sgraph.GL3ScenegraphRenderer
Add a mesh to be drawn later.
addMesh(String, PolygonMesh) - Method in interface sgraph.IScenegraphRenderer
Add a mesh to be rendered in the future.
addNode(String, INode) - Method in interface sgraph.IScenegraph
Adds a node to itself.
addNode(String, INode) - Method in class sgraph.Scenegraph
 
addPolygonMesh(String, PolygonMesh) - Method in interface sgraph.IScenegraph
Add a polygon mesh that will be used by one or more leaves in this scene graph
addPolygonMesh(String, PolygonMesh) - Method in class sgraph.Scenegraph
 
animate(float) - Method in interface sgraph.IScenegraph
Specific scene graph implementations should put code that animates specific nodes in the scene graph, based on a time provided by the caller
animate(float) - Method in class sgraph.Scenegraph
 
animation_transform - Variable in class sgraph.TransformNode
Matrices storing the static and animation transformations separately, so that they can be changed separately
